scripts.build: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties transform-object-rest-spread transform-react-constant-elements transform-react-inline-elements transform-react-remove-prop-types ] ] -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify js/main.js -o compiled/bundle.js
scripts.watch: watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties transform-object-rest-spread transform-react-constant-elements transform-react-inline-elements transform-react-remove-prop-types ] ] -g [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] js/main.js -o compiled/bundle.js
